main event: A civilian observed a round object with bright white and green lights in Las Vegas for 1.5 hours on March 11, 1965.
interesting points: The object was reported to be round and had very bright lights., The object failed out and disappeared in a northeasterly direction., This sighting involved multiple observers reporting similar characteristics of the object., The sighting lasted for about one and a half hours., Observers included children and adults who described the object from different locations.
sighted object: one round object with white and green lights
